Description: Ostracon, large fragment of the shoulder of a brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the grooved exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text, writ large.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394312) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394312)
